title: The Christ Child Surrounded by the Instruments of the Passion
description: The Christ Child Surrounded by the Instruments of the Passion; Simon Bening (Flemish, about 1483 - 1561); Bruges, Belgium; about 1525 - 1530; Tempera colors, gold paint, and gold leaf on parchment; Leaf: 16.8 x 11.4 cm (6 5/8 x 4 1/2 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 19, fol. 31v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
